moves.1... f5: Black also doesn't seem too bad
moves.2... e6: If black had played g5, white would have had a checkmate!!
moves.4... Ke7: I don't know about you, but I think black is rather stupid!
moves.5. d8=Q+: I wonder what black is going to do now!
moves.6. Qxh4: White has still only moved 1 piece!
moves.6... Ne7: Black seems to be bringing its pieces out
moves.7. Qc4+: White is on the go here
moves.7... Kf6: Black also seems to be keen to advance its king
moves.8. Qxc7: White's eating away at black's pieces
moves.10. Qxd5+: Not a very good attck though
moves.11... Ke4: Not too much of a choice this time!
moves.13. Qxc8+: Not a single white piece taken yet!!
moves.14... Be7: Another attack on the original pawn!!
moves.20. Qxa7: Look at how much plus white is!
moves.21. Qb6+: I wonder why white would do that
moves.21... Kg7 22. Qf6+: What? this is now getting really silly!
moves.22... Kg8: That was the only bad option for black!!
moves.24. Qf8#: A very rubbish ckeckmate and not one to be very proud of unless you are a real duffer!!
